projectGridLines.title: Title : It will be depend on the projects available during the time of PS.
projectGridLines.description:
Title : It will be depend on the projects available during the time of PS.

Description : Mostly projects will be in domain of pavement evaluation and structural health monitoring.

Skill set : Pavement evaluation, Pavement management system, Structural analysis etc.

Traits Expectation : Eagerness to learn, Teamwork and Collaboration, Adaptability and basic skills and knowledge.


Expected learning : Different type of equipment used for evaluation of structures and Pavement domain. Software required for industry, latest innovations in technologies regarding civil engineering.

Specific courses required for Project execution : Pavement material, pavement analysis and Design, Pavement management system, building materials, RCC and other Civil engineering courses.
